original_text: They did more than we had even hoped for! First, they gave themselves to the Lord. Then they also gave themselves to us. They did that because God wanted them to do it.
korean_text: 우리가 바라던 것뿐 아니라 그들이 먼저 자신을 주께 드리고 또 하나님의 뜻을 따라 우리에게 주었도다

sentences.original_text: They did more than we had even hoped for!
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 우리가 바랐던 것보다 더 많이 했습니다!

sentences.original_text: First, they gave themselves to the Lord.
Then they also gave themselves to us.
sentences.korean_translation: 그 다음 그들은 자신을 우리에게도 바쳤습니다.

sentences.original_text: They did that because God wanted them to do it.
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 그렇게 한 이유는 하나님께서 그렇게 하기를 원하셨기 때문입니다.
